title: Shift: Beyond the Numbers of the Climate Crisis (2013)
description:
Shift: Beyond the Numbers of the Climate Crisis is a documentary film by brother & sister duo Sam and Kate Fulbright.  They take a closer look at what climate change really means in the United States, and dive beyond the daunting numbers and graphs to meet the people and communities affected by the problem of climate change.

Learn more about getting involved at ShiftTheClimate.org

Stop the Alberta tar sands! #NoKXL
